name: The POPOLOGIST Metropolis
description:
Object:   You are on assignment of a broadcast / newspaper company. “The POPOLOGIST®”, 

You are on a mission to capture video or photos of events, people or objects throughout the landscaped city within your cameras battery life (TIME) and memory allotted (DATA SPACE). Don’t overshoot or you cant complete all assignments. User gets hints to find certain events on their onboard cellphone devise that keeps track of earnings and assignment lists. User has a map that allows a top view of travels and where events are or could be. 

Also a battery life graph, a data capacity used.  All tools he pulls from his holster, Photography Camera (requires 2 hands to shoot, Video Camera only uses one hand to operate, Communication device Cell Phone, & Map. (No weapons) User can earn more battery life and memory cards to extend game play.
